annotations.kubernetes.io/description: Contains a CA bundle that can be used to verify the kube-apiserver when using internal endpoints such as the internal service IP or kubernetes.default.svc. No other usage is guaranteed across distributions of Kubernetes clusters.

data.mongod.conf:
operationProfiling:
  mode: slowOp
systemLog:
  verbosity: 1
storage:
  engine: wiredTiger
  wiredTiger:
    engineConfig:
      directoryForIndexes: false
      journalCompressor: snappy
    collectionConfig:
      blockCompressor: snappy
    indexConfig:
      prefixCompression: true

replsets.configuration:
operationProfiling:
  mode: slowOp
systemLog:
  verbosity: 1
storage:
  engine: wiredTiger
  wiredTiger:
    engineConfig:
      directoryForIndexes: false
      journalCompressor: snappy
    collectionConfig:
      blockCompressor: snappy
    indexConfig:
      prefixCompression: true
replsets.name: rs0
